s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: We use coding standards to be able to write code easy to understand, to maintain, and to enhance.

s1.title: Java Code
s1.p: Generaly we stick with standards. In the case of coding standards we simply use the guidelines from Sun.

ul.li: Thou shalt only produce code conforming to the Java code conventions, as they are set down on the page http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/html/CodeConvTOC.doc.html
Thou shalt not produce any code containing tab-stops.

s1.title: XML and XSP
s1.p: The only restriction we impose on XML, XSLT and XSP code is that the indenting is 2 spaces. Again please no tab stops.
